King of the Court
Blending together a perfect mix of impeccable quality and superior style, this stunningly renovated home is a superior offering for those wanting the very best in family living. Beautifully crafted with high-end fittings throughout such as Tasmanian Oak floors and designer window furnishings and featuring a flexible and appealing floorplan - this home will steal your heart.
The expansive meals and kitchen area is sunlit with dual access to both the front and rear decks making this home an entertainer’s dream. The striking kitchen features CaesarStone benches, walk in pantry, soft closing draws and is fitted with the finest stainless steel Baumatic appliances including induction stove top and built-in espresso machine to enhance your kitchen experience. This beautiful and functional space is the perfect hub to congregate with loved ones for quiet family dinners at the breakfast bar or entertain on a larger scale in the adjacent dining zone. Additionally, there is also a convenient study alcove making the most of every nook and cranny.
The adjoining lounge forms a second living zone and is accessed by gorgeous French style doors opening to an elegant space perfect for cosy nights in warmed by the Coonara wood fire or simply to unwind with a good movie on the big screen.
Accommodation comprises four spacious bedrooms all with plush carpet and built in robes including a sumptuous master bedroom in its own zone at the front of the home complete with decadent walk in robe, sparkling contemporary ensuite and recessed television space for the ultimate parent’s retreat. The other bedrooms are serviced by a deluxe central bathroom with shower, bath and dual sinks along with a separate toilet. There is also a well-sized study for those who work from home or set up the kids with a homework room.
The magical outdoor zone features a magnificent alfresco space over two levels fitted out to ensure you are the kings of entertaining. There is also a delightful lush lawn providing a private and secure space for the family to bask in the sunshine along with a flourishing lemon tree and a cubby house for the kids to enjoy.
Additional extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and two split systems for seasonal comfort, modern fully fitted out laundry with drying rack, an abundance of storage, double carport, off-street parking and two garden sheds.
Exceptionally well situated in a court locale which comes with peace, privacy and a sense of community, this is the perfect place to start your next chapter. Within close proximity to a fantastic collection of local schools, Croydon central and minutes from Eastland and Eastlink, this impressive residence will wow you. Don’t delay. Enquire today.

Description:
'Tradie haven' with dual-occ. potential.
Comfort and convenience come together in this spacious family home, offering three generously sized bedrooms, multiple living areas and an expansive wrap-around deck - and that's not all.
For starters, the home is set on a large 856m2 (approx.) block, boasting dual-occupancy potential (subject to council approval) and is located within General Residential Zone - Schedule 1 (GRZ1). This highly convenient address also places the occupants within close proximity to shops, schools and transport.

The fully-equipped kitchen features an electric wall oven, induction cooktop, dishwasher and glossy timber benchtops with breakfast bar. Overseeing the combined family and meals area, a glass sliding door leads outside to an enviable entertaining area that perfectly accommodates the needs of a growing family. Suited to a variety of buyers, this spacious and relaxed family home offers a promising future ahead.
